message.body: John you should come up this Saturday to help me move some of my bigger stuff down to the springs. Ill make you as many pizzas as you want and I have lots of wine! I don't have to be out til August so it's not a big deal if you can't this weekend
I think I will come Friday
Any time I'm not up to much
Will there be attractive single ladies?
Sadly no I don't think so but Amanda wants to go to the bars you could meet one if we go out!
Amanda is single but I wouldn't say attractive. Which makes me a bad friend but you've seen her she's blonde
Eww I know who u are talking about
Idk about the bars I spend too much
Exactly. But we can stay home I like you a lot more than her. Also terrible to say about a friend but it true! Ill get bud lights and we will throw down here.
